featured.title: miniRT
featured.description: A mini raytracer built from scratch in C, rendering realistic 3D scenes with lights, shadows, and reflection.

featured.title: FdF
featured.description: A wireframe terrain renderer in isometric projection. Parses elevation maps and draws them with depth perception.

hackathons.title: Rackaton
hackathons.description: A web app that promotes sustainable wardrobe habits through AI-driven clothing suggestions and carbon footprint tracking.

hackathons.title: GreenHack
hackathons.description: Hackathon project tackling environmental impact through data-driven green habit tracking and gamification.

other.title: Minishell
other.description: A fully functional Unix shell written in C. Handles pipes, redirections, built-ins, signal handling and environment variables.

other.title: Philosophers
other.description: A concurrency simulation based on the Dining Philosophers problem. Implements threads, mutexes, and race condition prevention.

other.title: Push_swap
other.description: A sorting algorithm visualiser with stack operations. Designed for algorithm optimisation under strict operation limits.
